apple_vendor_description: Rendered on Apple devices, this emoji captures a loving embrace between two women, one with a neutral, un-toned complexion and the other with a deep, dark skin tone, a vibrant red heart glowing between them.  The Apple design emphasizes the gentle curves of their figures and the affectionate connection, enhanced by realistic lighting that casts soft shadows and highlights, giving the heart a tangible, glossy appearance.  It symbolizes love, partnership, and romantic commitment between women, offering a visually rich representation of affection and unity.
